Package ru.cos.sim.driver.composite.cases

Class Summary
CarFollowingCase Car following road case.
ForthcomingNode  
LaneAlignCase  
LaneChangeCase Lane change case responsible for lane change action induced by driver's comfort motives.
RespectQueueCase In case of front fork is observed, we must respect queue of the vehicles that stays on the lane we choose as desired, we must not go ahead them, instead must to stop and try to join end of the queue.
RouterCase Router case responsible to navigate vehicle while it is moving on the road.
SafetyCase  
TrafficLightCase Reaction on traffic light.
